markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tenacious Net](/Feats.aspx?ID=2825) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Escaping your nets is no simple task. The [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) DC to [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=34) or [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) your nets increases from 16 to 18. After a creature you grabbed with a net Escapes or Forces Open the net, stray strands of the net cling to the creature, causing them to remain [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the beginning of their next turn.
name: Tenacious Net

summary_markdown: Escaping your nets is no simple task.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Tenacious Net Source The Mwangi Expanse pg. 121 2.0 --- Escaping your nets is no simple task. The Athletics DC to Force Open or Escape your nets increases from 16 to 18. After a creature you grabbed with a net Escapes or Forces Open the net, stray strands of the net cling to the creature, causing them to remain flat-footed until the beginning of their next turn.
